check_box.name: streaming_music
check_box.label: Play Streaming Music When Available (uses more bandwidth)

check_box.name: notify_stream_changes
check_box.label: Notify about streaming music title changes
check_box.tool_tip: When using FMOD as the audio driver, you may check this box to get notified about parcel music title changes. Note that the currently playing music title is also reported when available in the tool tip of the music controls icon, on the bottom right of the viewer window.

check_box.name: streaming_video
check_box.label: Play Streaming Media When Available (uses more bandwidth)

check_box.name: media_enable_filter
check_box.label: Parcel media and audio stream filtering
check_box.tool_tip: This setting entitles you to allow/deny/whitelist/blacklist the servers for parcel audio and media streams. When the viewer connects to a media or streaming server, your IP is exposed and some people might use it to try and track you and make assumptions about what your alt avatars could be.

check_box.name: media_lookup_ip
check_box.label: Lookup IP address for filtered domains
check_box.tool_tip: Enable IP lookups on media domains. This allows to defeat domain name changes of fixed IP servers that you already banned under another domain name. It however incurs short 'freezes' (1 second or so) on successful lookups (valid domains) and longer 'freezes' (10s or so) on failing lookups (invalid domain names, normally rare).

check_box.name: enable_gesture_sounds
check_box.label: Enable gesture sounds
check_box.tool_tip: Unchecking this box allows to mute all sounds coming from gestures.
